response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you is estimated at $15,000. My proposal is to offer it to you for $12,000, aiming to provide a fair deal that respects both the product's value and your budget. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
